title: Sci-Fi Engineering Sound Effects Collection
description: A set of 178 futuristic engineering sound effects.
longDescription:
Welcome to your futuristic assembly plant!


With this collection of 178 carefully designed sounds you can excavate and process minerals, liquids and gasses. Manage your electricity grid to provide power to manufacturing machinery, complete with and intricate network of conveyors and piping!


Finish your creations with sounds of gears, clunky hammers, robotic servos and digital telemetry for a truly immersive experience!


Previews:


Sci-Fi Manufacturing SFX Pack

Sci-Fi Conveyor And Piping SFX Pack

Sci-Fi Power Grid SFX Pack

Sci-Fi Robotics SFX PackÂ 

Sci-Fi Telemetry SFX Pack

Gritty Sci-Fi SFX Pack
